sn22.86:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn22.86:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anuradho bhagavato avidure arannakutikayam viharati.
sn22.86:1.3: Atha kho sambahula annatitthiya paribbajaka yenayasma anuradho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anuradhena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn22.86:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka ayasmantam anuradham etadavocum:
sn22.86:1.5: “yo so, avuso anuradha, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato imesu catusu thanesu pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn22.86:1.6: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va”ti?
sn22.86:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anuradho te annatitthiye paribbajake etadavoca:
sn22.86:2.2: “yo so avuso tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tam tathagato annatra imehi catuhi thanehi pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn22.86:2.3: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va”ti.
sn22.86:2.4: Evam vutte, annatitthiya paribbajaka ayasmantam anuradham etadavocum:
sn22.86:2.5: “so cayam bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero va pana balo abyatto”ti.
sn22.86:2.6: Atha kho annatitthiya paribbajaka ayasmantam anuradham navavadena ca balavadena ca apasadetva utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn22.86:3.1: Atha kho ayasmato anuradhassa acirapakkantesu tesu annatitthiyesu paribbajakesu etadahosi:
sn22.86:3.2: “sace kho mam te annatitthiya paribbajaka uttarim panham puccheyyum.
sn22.86:3.3: Katham byakaramano nu khvaham tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam vuttavadi ceva bhagavato assam, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkheyyam, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyyam, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agaccheyya”ti?
sn22.86:4.1: Atha kho ayasma anuradho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anuradho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.86:4.3: Atha kho, bhante, sambahula annatitthiya paribbajaka yenaham tenupasankamimsu …pe… mam etadavocum:
sn22.86:4.4: ‘yo so, avuso anuradha, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tam tathagato imesu catusu thanesu pannapayamano pannapeti—
sn22.86:4.5: hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti …
sn22.86:4.6: hoti ca na ca hoti, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va’”ti?
sn22.86:5.1: Evam vuttaham, bhante, te annatitthiye paribbajake etadavocam:
sn22.86:5.2: “yo so, avuso, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato annatra imehi catuhi thanehi pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn22.86:5.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti vati.
sn22.86:5.5: Evam vutte, bhante, te annatitthiya paribbajaka mam etadavocum:
sn22.86:5.6: ‘so cayam bhikkhu na vo bhavissati acirapabbajito thero va pana balo abyatto’ti.
sn22.86:5.7: Atha kho mam, bhante, te annatitthiya paribbajaka navavadena ca balavadena ca apasadetva utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn22.86:6.1: Tassa mayham, bhante, acirapakkantesu tesu annatitthiyesu paribbajakesu etadahosi:
sn22.86:6.2: ‘sace kho mam te annatitthiya paribbajaka uttarim panham puccheyyum.
sn22.86:6.3: Katham byakaramano nu khvaham tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam vuttavadi ceva bhagavato assam, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkheyyam, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyyam, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agaccheyya’”ti?
sn22.86:7.4: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.86:7.6: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn22.86:10.2: rupam … vedana … sanna … sankhara … vinnanam tathagatoti samanupassasi”ti?
sn22.86:11.2: ayam so arupi … avedano … asanni … asankharo … avinnano tathagatoti samanupassasi”ti?
sn22.86:12.1: “Ettha ca te, anuradha, dittheva dhamme saccato thetato tathagate anupalabbhiyamane kallam nu te tam veyyakaranam:
sn22.86:12.2: ‘yo so, avuso, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tam tathagato annatra imehi catuhi thanehi pannapayamano pannapeti—
sn22.86:12.3: hoti tathagato param maranati va … na hoti … hoti ca na ca hoti … neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va’”ti?
sn22.86:13.2: Pubbe caham, anuradha, etarahi ca dukkhanceva pannapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodhan”ti.
